name: Floovels
description: Your cellmate Ductina helps you escape from a fortress founded by the Tzergo Corporation, which is stealing the best workers from all over the world, but something goes wrong. During development, we were inspired by the Portal dilogy. Controls: WASD - movement Left Shift - sprint LMB - pickup object RMB - throw object (you must have LMB pressed) Thanks! Your Dreamweavers.
